User experience improvements! Of course, we still poppin ;)
User experience improvements! Of course, we still poppin ;)

Welcome to the New Popl App

Popl 3 comes with an entirely new look and feel with new features, options and functionality.

Introducing Popl Pro - Your Popl, upgraded

Popl Pro comes with several new features including:

- Social / Business mode: Build 2 profiles and switch between them instantly to fit whatever social setting you are in
- Unlimited links: Say goodbye to our one link limit per app. Have 3 Instagrams? No problem! We allow 8 links total for each application or custom link
- Custom link titles: Choose what title is under your links, no more static titles
- Pro Analytics: See your pops, profile views, link analytics and more with the whole new pro analytics page
- Pop Map: See exactly where you met each of your connections and reference them by location
- Popl Ambassador Integration: Link your Popl ambassador code or referral link to your Popl profile to get paid whenever someone buys a Popl from your profile
- New Pro links: Add 8 new links to your profile for even more functionality.


The 8 new links are:

- Calendly
- OnlyFans
- FaceTime
- Apple Podcasts
- Tinder
- Discord
- Phone call
- Yelp


Other new features include:

- Completely new UI
- An ON/OFF toggle for your Popl! No more accidental or unwanted pops
- Fully customizable contact cards. Choose exactly which links you want included
- Introducing the People Page. Keep track of who you pop and reference their profiles instantly
- All new 3D style profiles
- Brand new QR code page with sharing options
- Create a Popl card for your Apple or Android wallet
- Brand new how to pop tutorial
- New activation flows for Popl, Popl keychains, and Handl X Popl
- Pop streaks
- Pop location

Welcome to the New Popl App

Popl 3.0 comes with an entirely new look and feel with new features, options and functionality.

Introducing Popl Pro - Your Popl, upgraded

New year, new features:

- Popl Connect: People who don't have Popl can now share info with you!
- Popl band: Our newest Popl product is now available
- Push notifications are live
- Restore purchases are up
- Bug fixes
